snippet.title: Drill Core - Release Date Trailer | Awesome Indies | Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
⚠️ TRY OUT THE DEMO RIGHT NOW:
 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3023940/Drill_Core_Demo/

Can you take profits to greater depths? Manage your own mining crew as you descend deeper into the planet’s core: drilling, digging, collecting profits, and surviving ruthless attacks from the local monster population, all in a day’s work. Each contract brings a different set of challenges… and rewards.

Join Drill Core Inc. on 12 September and carve your path to unparalleled profits! 

Chat about the game with us!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DrillCoreGame 
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/DJ2d9D5dNM
